effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description:
Equip: Falling below 60% health surrounds you with a protective vortex of junk, reducing damage taken by 50% for 15 sec or until 1.5 million damage is prevented. This effect may only occur every 30 sec.

After 20 sec without activating while in combat, the Scrapfield overloads to energize you with 3,194 Haste for 12 sec.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,755 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 204 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
G'Hanir, the Mother Tree
